# MTKMetalVertexFormatFromModelIO(_:)

**Function**

Returns a converted Metal vertex format.

## Declaration

```swift
func MTKMetalVertexFormatFromModelIO(_ vertexFormat: MDLVertexFormat) -> MTLVertexFormat
```

## Parameters

- **vertexFormat**: A Model I/O vertex format to convert from.

## Return Value

A Metal vertex format value.

## Discussion

This function returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLVertexFormat/invalid] if no matching [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLVertexFormat] exists.

## Converting Between Model I/O and Metal Vertex Formats

- **MTKModelIOVertexFormatFromMetal(_:)**: Returns a converted Model I/O vertex format.
